bkds_subjGen_source_index_all.src_columns: distinct insight_id, search_id, search_term, data_category, subject

bkds_subjGen_source_index_wip.src_columns: subject_id, insight_id, search_id, orig_search_term as search_term, data_category, subject
bkds_subjGen_source_index_wip.clause: where coalesce(orig_search_term, '$') not in (select coalesce(searchterm, '$') from dev.stg_api_source_api_results) and length(subject_id) > 0 and data_category='flowers_trees_plants'

bkds_select_query_get_column_names.clause: WHERE table_schema = {src_schema} AND table_name = {src_obj} ORDER BY ordinal_position

bkds_llmPromptjGen_source.src_columns: prompt_id, prompt_template_user, prompt_template_system, prompt_key, llm_role, llm_expertise, llm_goal, llm_goal_desc, prompt_type, prompt_intro, prompt_description, data_output_profile, data_source, key_concepts, persona_id, occupation, interests, audiencedesc,trait1, trait2, trait3, trait4, trait5, url_id, search_term, subj_title, category, page_url, text_chunk

bkds_llmPromptjGen_source_places.src_columns: prompt_id, prompt_template_user, prompt_template_system, prompt_key, llm_role, llm_expertise, llm_goal, llm_goal_desc, prompt_type, prompt_intro, prompt_description, data_output_profile, data_source, key_concepts, persona_id, occupation, interests, audiencedesc,trait1, trait2, trait3, trait4, trait5, url_id, search_term, subj_title, category, page_url, text_chunk

bkds_llmHygiene_source.src_columns: prompt_id, prompt_template_user, prompt_template_system, prompt_key, llm_role, llm_expertise, llm_goal, llm_goal_desc, prompt_type, prompt_intro, prompt_description, data_output_profile, data_source, key_concepts, persona_id, occupation, interests, audiencedesc,trait1, trait2, trait3, trait4, trait5, url_id, search_term, subj_title, category, page_url, text_chunk

bkds_contentGen_videos_query_key.src_columns: insight_id, insight_id, search_id, subject_id, subject_title, description, search_term, video_url, video_title, thumb_url, data_source

bkds_contentGen_img_query_key.src_columns: insight_id, insight_id, search_id, subject_id, subject_title, description, search_term, image_url, data_source

bkds_contentGen_text_query_key.src_columns: insight_id, search_id, search_id, subject_id, subject_title, description, search_term, page_url, subject_content, data_source

bkds_contentGen_insight_query_key.src_columns: insight_id, search_id, subject_id, subject_title, search_term, data_category, data_subject

bkds_contentGen_web_feed_master.src_columns: cluster_id, url_id, subject_id, subject_title, default_img, data_category, data_category_id, data_subject, data_subject_id, images, videos, featured_images, related_topics, subject_content, content_name

bkds_nodejs_content_feed_master.src_columns: cluster_id, url_id, subject_id, subject_title, default_img, data_category, data_category_id, data_subject, data_subject_id, images, videos, featured_images, related_topics, subject_content, content_name

bkds_contentGen_video_index.src_columns: vid_url, vid_title, vid_url_id, vid_thumb, vid_thumb_id, title, description,data_category, data_subject_id, 'youtube' as data_source, data_category, data_category_id

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_yt1.clause: where data_source='youtube' order by random() limit 1

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_yt2.clause: where data_source='youtube' order by random()  limit 2500

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_yt3.clause: where data_source='youtube' order by random() limit 550

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_yt4.clause: where data_source='youtube' order by random() limit 1550

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_flickr.clause: where data_source='flickr' order by random() limit 150

bkds_imgCaceGen_select_wiki.clause: where data_source='wiki' order by random() limit 150
